Art Exhibitions -- Lebanon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Saida between the memory and reality. Aquarelles of the painter Fouad Jawhar. [Painting reproduced on poster by] Fouad Jawhar, at "al-Muntada" next to Wardiyye and Clemenceau Street. 26January - 5 February 1988.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Watercolors by the Artist Fouad Jawhar
